Sentencas: At 200 degrees C, 8 mol% yttria doped zirconia (8YSZ) nanocrystals were synthesized through a hydrothermal process for 24 It.
Titulo: Low temperature sintering of 8YSZ electrolyte film for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Characterizations revealed that the as-synthesized 8YSZ powder was weakly agglomerated and had a surface area of 121 m(2)/g and an average grain size of similar to 9 nm.
Titulo: Low temperature sintering of 8YSZ electrolyte film for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Sintering behaviors of the 8YSZ powder were studied via isothermal and non-isothermal experiments.
Titulo: Low temperature sintering of 8YSZ electrolyte film for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It demonstrated that the powder has high sintering activity, where 8YSZ green films prepared via dip coating using the slurry directly formed by the hydrothermal process can be fully densified at 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Low temperature sintering of 8YSZ electrolyte film for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thickness of the sintered film can be controlled through adjusting the 8YSZ concentration in the slurry and repeating the dipping-coating-sintering cycle.
Titulo: Low temperature sintering of 8YSZ electrolyte film for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The superior sinterability achieved in the present study was mainly attributed to the high green density and homogeneity of the green bodies with narrow-distributed interparticle pore structure.
Titulo: Low temperature sintering of 8YSZ electrolyte film for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The low sintering temperature is of great practical importance for improving film quality and facilitating co-sintering of 8YSZ films together with other SOFC components.
Titulo: Low temperature sintering of 8YSZ electrolyte film for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
